description: Adds a Root Oauth Integration to Continuous Delivery for PE

root_email.description: The email address associated with the CDPE root account.

root_password.description: The password associated with the CDPE root account.

provider.description: The Oauth provider for the integration. Must be one of 'github' or 'azuredevops'.

client_id.description: The client id associated with the Oauth integration.

client_secret.description: The client secret associated with the Oauth integration.

resolvable_hostname.description: A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

web_ui_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.
